summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1405 m), feels like temperature (up 3.5°C), light levels (up 5648 lux), and outside temperature (up 3.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 71.3m higher than yesterday, 785.1m lower than the past week, 1405.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1336.9m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. Chance of light rain, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
